innhold.avsnitt: You can log in to your personal pregnancy benefit webpage Dine svangerskapspenger and see the status of your case. Here you can also modify your application, upload any outstanding documents, and see an overview of your case.
If you have applied using a printed form, you will be able to see the status of your case here after about ten days.

avsnitt.lenke: See what the processing time is in your county

innhold.avsnitt: Once your application has been fully processed

Once we have finished processing your application you will find information about your case on your personal pregnancy benefit webpage Dine svangerskapspenger. Here you can also submit any outstanding documents and apply for changes.

Pregnancy benefit is paid by the 25th of the month. You can log in and see all the payments you have received in the last three years. If you receive your parental benefit from your employer, contact your employer about payment dates and for an overview of payments.
